creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
We'd appreciate a complete WAR we can use to reproduce this issue rather than
individual pieces, as well as the complete stack trace or error report of what
you're seeing, rather than a one-line summary.  Thank you ;)

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This is as per section 8.8 of the JavaBeans specification. The method
setHAlign() is assumed to refer to a property HAlign, not hAlign.
